text:
there's some discussion of something called 'instance-based learning' , and how it's connected to lazy learning here:
https://www.cs.rutgers.edu/~elgammal/classes/cs536/lectures/IBL.pdf

googling 'instance-based learning' yields this:
https://www.quora.com/What-are-the-differences-between-instance-based-and-model-based-learning-in-machine-learning
, which introduces yet another notion of 'model-based learning'.
I'll deal with all this crap later.
title: Comment by '(anonymous)' on 'Lazy Learning'
